languages.text:
At the start of their turn, each ally in the radius of the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm restores {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} Wounds and has a {uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}% chance to remove 1 Injury. Works only on allies that are still in combat.
This effect ends if the Swarm is destroyed. Only one Signal effect can be active.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of their turn, each ally in the radius of the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm restores {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} Wounds and has a {uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}% chance to remove 1 Injury. Works only on allies that are still in combat.
This effect ends if the Swarm is destroyed. Only one Signal effect can be active.

languages.text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and a {uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}% chance (cannot be more than 90%) to remove 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}. Does not affect {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} allies.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
languages.original_text:
В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} каждый союзник в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов восстанавливает {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и получает шанс {uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}% (не может быть больше 90%) исцелить 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g}. Не действует на союзников {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}.
! Эффект этого сигнала длится, пока рой сервочерепов остается в строю или пока не использован другой сигнал.

languages.text:
Zu Beginn ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} erhalten alle Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und eine Chance von {uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} % (max. 90 %), 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} zu entfernen. Funktioniert nicht bei {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlosen{/g} Verbündeten.
! Dieser Signaleffekt dauert an, bis der Servoschädel-Schwarm zerstört wird oder eine andere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Signalfähigkeit{/g} einsetzt.

languages.text:
Au début de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, tous les alliés dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes gagnent {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et {uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} % de chances (ne peuvent pas être supérieures à 90 %) de supprimer 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g}. Cet effet ne s'applique pas aux alliés {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconscients{/g}.
! Cet effet de signal dure jusqu'à ce que l'essaim de servocrânes soit détruit ou utilise une autre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de signal.

languages.text:
所有距离伺服头骨集群4格内的盟友，在各自的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都会恢复{uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，且有{uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}%几率（最高不超过90%）移除1处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。此能力对陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态的盟友无效。
！此信号的效果始终持续，直到伺服头骨集群被摧毁或使用其他信号{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。

languages.text:
Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, todos los aliados en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos recuperan {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y tienen una probabilidad del {uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} % (máximo del 90 %) de curarse de una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g}. No afecta a aliados {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconscientes{/g}.
! Este efecto de señal dura hasta que el enjambre de servocráneos queda destruido o usa otra {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de señal.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セルの各味方は{uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を付与され、{uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}% （90%を超えてはならない）の確率で1の{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}を取り除く。{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}の味方には効かない。
！このシグナル効果はサーヴォスカル・スウォームが破壊されるか、別のシグナル{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用するまで継続する。
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and a {uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}% chance (cannot be more than 90%) to remove 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}. Does not affect {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} allies.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
ターン開始時、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セルの各味方は{uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}の傷を付与され、{uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}%の確率で1の負傷を取り除く。意識不明の味方には効かない。
！このシグナル効果はサーヴォスカル・スウォームが破壊されるか、別のシグナルアビリティを使用するまで継続する。

ターン開始時、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セルの各味方は{uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}の傷を付与され、{uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}%の確率で1の負傷を取り除く。意識不明の味方には効かない。
！このシグナル効果はサーヴォスカル・スウォームが破壊されるか、別のシグナルアビリティを使用するまで継続する。

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her dost birim, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır ve %{uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} olasılıkla (%90'dan fazla olamaz) üzerindeki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g} ortadan kalkar. {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}Baygın{/g} dost birimlere etki etmez.
! Bu sinyal etkisi, hizmelet sürüsü imha edilene veya başka bir sinyal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanana dek sürer.
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each ally in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm gains {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and a {uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628}% chance (cannot be more than 90%) to remove 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g}. Does not affect {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g} allies.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her dost birim, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır ve %{uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} olasılıkla (%90'dan fazla olamaz) üzerindeki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g} ortadan kalkar. {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}Baygın{/g} dost birimlere etki etmez.
! Bu sinyal etkisi, hizmelet sürüsü imha edilene veya başka bir sinyal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanana dek sürer.

Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her dost birim, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında {uip|Heal|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanı{/g} kazanır ve %{uip|Chance|9af122965c3c4decad673e9ccf58c628} olasılıkla üzerindeki 1 sakatlık ortadan kalkar. Baygın dost birimlere etki etmez.
! Bu sinyal etkisi, hizmelet sürüsü imha edilene veya başka bir sinyal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanana dek sürer.
